response.explain: The previous action code successfully put the chicken in the fridge. Now, the next step is to take out the steak from the bottom cabinet.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge.
(2) Put the chicken in the fridge.
(3) Open the bottom cabinet.
(4) Take out the steak from the bottom cabinet.
(5) Put the steak in the fridge.
(6) Close the fridge.
response.code:
